p: The SARSCOVIDB is the first database to gather all data to date from differential expression analyses after SARS-CoV-2 infection, with manual checking of the data to give more accurate and faster analysis. Users do not need to have a background in bioinformatics because the user-friendly and simple interface enables all search possibilities to be explored. This allows the user to cross-reference data for the best understanding and analysis of the deposited data. Finally, the SARSCOVIDB is a promising tool for supporting scientists and medical professionals carrying out research and analysis on the molecular mechanisms of SARS-CoV-2 infection.
